Successful RDP logins to systems users w.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4624 and Zeek rdp.log on critical/sensitive systems for RDP login events. Establish a baseline of normal RDP access patterns per user and system. Identify logins deviating significantly from the baseline using correlation analysis (user vs. system accessed) or descriptive statistics.

RDP logins from a single source system/u.Action: Analyze Windows Event ID 4624 and Zeek rdp.log for RDP connections. Group successful connections by source user and source host. Identify instances where a single user/host initiates RDP sessions to a high number of distinct destination hosts within a defined time window (e.g., using count analysis).
